TLINE.TDLINE: This document explains how to control access to Genie AI features within
your organization by configuring teams and assigning appropriate
authorizations.
Prerequisites:
ABAP SDK Version: Ensure you have ABAP SDK version 1.9 or higher
installed.
Administrator Authorization: Assign the authorization object S_TABU_DIS
with authorization group ZCA_GENIE to the user who will act as the
administrator for Genie and will be responsible to maintain the config.
Team-Based Access Control:
To manage which teams can utilize the AI features, you can create new
teams and leverage the ZCA_GENIE authorization object. The ZGN_TEAM
field within this object uses the list of teams as a check table to
validate the user team and assigned features.
Authorization Process:
Create New Teams: Establish new teams based on your organizational
structure and requirements.
Assign Authorization Object: The security team should assign the
ZCA_GENIE authorization object to the relevant team roles, specifying:
The team in the ZGN_TEAM field.
The desired AI features in the ZGN_FEATUR field.
Feature field ZGN_FEATUR values:
G_EXPLAIN: Explain Code
G_REVIEW: Code Review
G_CODE: Suggest Code
G_AUT: Suggest ABAP Unit Test
G_TRANS: Language Translate
Recommendation:
For teams to fully utilize the potential of the AI features, we
recommend enabling access to all functionalities. However, you can
tailor access based on specific team needs and responsibilities.
